description: Attention Odyssey Project mods! If you need this image in a larger size, please let me know! As I am selling prints, I have set it to not allow downloads of the large original image! ----- He would see to it that their world would never threaten his, or any other, planet again. Submission for the Odyssey Project chapter 8. Odyssey is over! What a project it has been. I have some thoughts that I will turn into a journal entry, soon. What I liked about the last chapter was the sense that the story didn't end there. Whatever-Paul-Is-Now has defeated the immediate threat, but there is the sense that this is just the beginning for him. So this feeling is what I focused on for my last illustration. Whatever-Paul-Is-Now, triumphant over the remains of the monster, with the vast possibilities of space before him. I know that this visual is slightly different than what is described in the story; I have said this before, I'm really not interested in making an illustration that is a literal, completely accurate, visual representation of what is happening in the words. I think that good illustration transcends mere "illustration" and becomes art, and something that can communicate its own ideas, when it is a more figurative representation, not constrained by trying to make sure that every detail matches. ... is my excuse. I just really really wanted to draw a mean old fish skull. This illustration is my visual take on the famous romantic painting Wanderer Above the Sea of Fog. [link] (did you recognize it? did you pay attention in art history class?) I love this painting and the feelings it evokes. I had used it once before in a previous project which was much less successful. I am hoping this time that you will feel that I did this classic painting justice. Acrylic ink (colors) with digital effects (stars). ----- Prologue [link] (runner up) Chapter 1 [link] (winner) Chapter 2 [link] (runner up) Chapter 3 [link] (runner up) Chapter 4 [link] Chapter 5 [link] (runner up) Chapter 6 [link] (winner) Chapter 7 [link] (runner up) These are all available as prints.

STEPHANIE SMALL ARTIST AND ACTRESS stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com * Clip Clop Workshop WITH YOU I FELT THE TIDE: Poetry and Fantasy Art, an E-Book Artist Info * Commission Info * Contest Info * Trades/Gifts to Me! * Trades/Gifts from Me! * Tir'Rielle Island HorseArt Stable * D&D Gygaxian Steed * Eclipquines * Disciplines * My WolfArt-RPG * My CatArt * My Hybrids TIR'RIELLE ISLAND HORSEART STABLE | Tir'Rielle Island HORSEART Journal | Breeding Studs and Stallions | Broodmares | All Male Equines (Includes Sterile) | All Female Equines (Includes Sterile) | My HORSEART Breeding Gallery | All Breeding Pictures & Foals (Faves) MY HORSEART BREED GALLERIES Gygaxian Steed Gygaxian Steed Breed Sheet (Breed Creators/Owners: Shayla-Estate, StephanieSmall) Eclipquines Eclipquine Breed Sheet (Breed Creators/Owners: Jakedau,Help-4-homles-frends,StephanieSmall) Prisma Paint Prisma Paint Breed Sheet (Breed Creator: DancingDragonStables Breed Owner: StephanieSmall) HORSEART SISTER GAMES Tir'Rielle Island Feline Sanctuary CatArt RPG | Tir'Rielle Wolf Sanctuary WolfArt-RPG Journal | Tir'Rielle Wolf Sanctuary WolfArt-RPG Gallery | My Hybrid Art Game Journal | My Hybrid Art Game Gallery OTHER BREEDS Felshae Shapeshifting Winged Cats ARTIST BIOGRAPHY The Art of Stephanie Small is a complex blend of mythical and real. This is your personal invitation to enjoy a tour through the magical and mundane. See a breathtaking visual tour of ancient times and lands filled with trees, magical mushrooms, foliage, enchanted animals and awesome wizards. Let the splendor of unicorns, dragons, griffins, fairies, horses, the winged horse, Pegasus, and even the lone wolf lure you into a world of artistic exploration. Jump into a magical world! There is something beyond fantasy here. This is a mystical land just for you. If you like something real or mundane, Stephanie creates stunning domestic and wild animals. She studies biology and has a love of the ocean and wild animals. Horses, wolves, foxes, ponies, deer, dogs, cats, panthers, lions, fish, tigers and other creatures are some of the animals she draws. She has done animal pet portraits and is available for commission by emailing stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com for more information. Stephanie can be commissioned to do custom artwork including portraits of people, animals, homes or whatever your imagination can devise. She can do custom art as you as a pixie, fairy (faery) or mermaid too! Did you ever want to see yourself as a manga or anime character? Stephanie will do that! She can be commissioned to create a magical portrait of you! Stephanie creates art that features unicorns, mermaids, dragons, griffons and whatever fits her fancy. She can create cute, custom art for you that can be placed on a variety of Zazzle products such as Tshirts, blankets and more. Are you wanting your pet or child drawn? Want their picture on a blanket? Email Stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com for details. Stephanie Small is an artist located in California but she has spent time all over Oregon. Nature is an influential inspiration to Stephanie, as she seeks to augment and reflect what she sees around her in a variety of mediums. Inspired by medieval art, the fantasy and science fiction genre and more, Stephanie has developed a style of mythical realism. Stephanie uses a variety of styles and mixed mediums in her artwork. She regularly uses digital mediums such as Photoshop, Illustrator, Painter and more. She favors traditional mediums such as colored pencil, chalk, pen, ink, pencil, acrylic, watercolor. She has been known to adapt fabric, recycled art, recycled purses to create art that is both useful and stylish. Stephanie has been interviewed and featured in several magazines and websites. Her artwork has been published several times in books and magazines. She is best known for artwork featured in publications such as the Page, the Twisted Vine, the Unicorn and others. Her artwork will be featured on the cover of several upcoming books and publications. She often donates teaching, administrative assistance, research and artwork to many local non-profits. She has taught in-person and online classes on food preservation, writing, gardening, spirituality, unicorns, art and more. She has worked for (and with) the local government to initiate youth projects, senior events and business support. Stephanie loves unicorns and the horses she grew up with. It is clear in her art. She also loves mermaids. She even has a set of mermaid fins she can swim in. Stephanie Small finds inspiration in the animals of the ocean such as whales, orcas, narwhals and dolphins. Whether you are looking for a gift for girls, boys, men or women or whatever someone identify with, you will find something for everyone. Powerful images which have themes such as cute, goth, fantasy, wild animals, patterns, geometric designs, sacred symbols, pentagrams, realistic or more can all be commissioned and area available in current gallery images. Her products have been featured in pagan groups and wicca organizations. She embraces a variety of colors, favoring jewel tones (red, blue, green, purple) as well as more outgoing colors such as orange, yellow, pink, teal, green, violet or lavender, white and more. She provides many steampunk, medieval fantasy, black and gothic or cute anime and manga themed products. She is in the Society for Creative Anachronism ( SCA ) and is a member of the Vallejo Oddfellows as well as other non-profits. She has a veterinary assisting certificate which helps her by giving her a thorough education in anatomy and the natural world. She can also create images that recreate an emotion or event such as happy, sad, depression, love, joy, exhilaration, congratulations, birthday, holiday, Christmas, Halloween, Yule, Easter, Ostara, and whatever other holiday or celebration you can think of! You can purchase her merchandise from Clip Clop Workshop her website. If you are looking for a personalized gift, look no further! These unique and stunning pieces of work are available in a variety of pieces and many can be customized to your preference. Are you expecting? She has a bunch of great baby gifts available. You can find personalized wedding gifts, Christmas presents and stuff for him and for her! Looking for something for kids, well this art is geared to making them squeal with joy! You can find a variety of personalized birthday gifts, photo gifts and products that appeal to anyone! Stephanie has provided high end and unique quality items, as well as some more inexpensive and cheap items to fill stockings! Visit her Store! Many of her pieces are cute and fun. She loves to paint her pictures using a variety of colors, she often blends them together. Highlight of contrasting hues augment a variety of her pieces. Whether your favorite color is red, blue, yellow, pink, green, brown, orange, black or white, there is an image that will fit into your home and apparel desires. Stephanie has prepared a variety of images suitable for any occasion. You can explore her Zazzle page to find pillows, blankets, T-shirts, wooden gift boxes, necklaces, jewelry and clothing. These are available for birthday, Christmas, Yule, Easter, Ostara, Thanksgiving, Halloween, Veteran's Day, Solstices, Equinoxes, Eclipses and other holidays. Stephanie Small is also an actress and you will be able to see her in the upcoming series, 13 Reasons Why (season 2) and several upcoming major motion pictures. She does voiceover, voice acting, modeling and can also be hired for these services by emailing stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com. She owns a professional audio and video production company, Clip Clop Workshop. description: Attention Odyssey Project mods! If you need this image in a larger size, please let me know! As I am selling prints, I have set it to not allow downloads of the large original image! ----- The creature sharing his body struggled to escape the pain, to fight back, but not while he still held some control. He felt a tingling pressure reverberating through him. The bones of his mouth cracked and split, his teeth melting away and forming a hard cephalopod beak. Submission for Odyssey Project II chapter 6 (winner). Hm, feeling kind of like I may be running out of ideas now, and also that I didn't spent enough time planning out my painting before I started in with the ink. I didn't have enough time to do a second try at the painting though, so I hope you still enjoy this. I'm wondering what's going to happen now with the story. The monster's still changing Paul and Maya is still fighting with him. Two chapters left to wrap it up. I'm wondering how everything is going to conclude, and really hoping that it's not going to be a simple case of, then the monster died, the end. Write a good next chapter, guys! Acrylic ink. ----- Prologue [link] (runner up) Chapter 1 [link] (winner) Chapter 2 [link] (runner up) Chapter 3 [link] (runner up) Chapter 4 [link] Chapter 5 [link] (runner up) Chapter 7 [link] (runner up) Chapter 8 [link] These are all available as prints.

description: This is my first typography art I really did. I wanted to do it for a very long time  but now I found the right quote and the right time to do it. It is nothing special  only the quote is amazing and needs to be shared. For sure, it is also a little bit of an hommage to Steve Jobs. But not only for what he invented, but more for how brave he was while looking into the face of death. He gives us a great lesson about what life really is with this quote. Comments are very appreciated. You are also allowed to download this and use it personally. EDIT: I changed the quotation marks to the english ones. I am a german native speaker and our quotation marks look like this  But this is an english quote, there is nothing german in this, so they were wrong. Now I used the english marks. Much better. YES, GRAMMER IS IMPORTANT! And quotation marks ARE grammer! DONE ON A MAC  OF COURSE! What else?  Paper texture: www.lostandtaken.com Splatters: ~LeeDeeYa ~eMelody ~frostbell Thank you very much for your great patterns and textures! Without your awesome works I would have not been able to do this work. Font used: Chalet

description: <=original image TIR'RIELLE ISLAND HORSEART STABLE | Tir'Rielle Island HORSEART Journal | Breeding Studs and Stallions | Broodmares | All Male Equines (Includes Sterile) | All Female Equines (Includes Sterile) | My HORSEART Breeding Gallery | All Breeding Pictures & Foals (Faves) .:*~*:._.:*~*:._.:*~*:._.:*~*:._.:*~*:._.:*~*:._.:*~*:._.:*~*:. CHARACTER DETAILS Name: Delaria Nickame(s): Owner: StephanieSmall Gender: Female Breed: Unicorn Build: Pony Diet: Herbivore (Does not need to eat on Tir’Rielle Island) Age: Unknown Height: Appearance: Natural Color: white Mane: Tail: Hooves: Eye Color: Color Changing Markings: Skills/Talents(s): Magical Training: Basic Training Magical Powers: Discipline(s): Halter Rider(s): Princess Tariel Nimara (shrunk down magically) Equipment: Stable Colors Racing Equipment (Colors: Black and Purple) Passable Traits: Sire/Dam: starter Breeding Picture that Created this Horse: starter Bloodlines: starter Offspring: None Other: For stud/lease: Yes. My policy is that you note me to make arrangements. If you are leasing one of my mares, you draw the breeding picture and foal. If you are using one of my studs and approach me, you are drawing the breeding picture and foal. I have the right to refuse any breeding, but don't take it personal For stud/lease Openings: There are three slots open at any given time for this horse. Slots open as breedings are completed. Personality: Shy, elusive and hard to find. History: Raised in the Heart of Tir'Rielle, a magical island where equines rule. Residence/Home: Tir'Rielle Island. This animal lives on Tir'Rielle a magical island where my Stable in the Horseart Game resides. Tir'Rielle is an enchanted stable that dominates a tiny floating temperate forest island. It usually lies within a great mist, far in the unknown places, but it travels where it needs to in order to make its precious animals available to meet other equines. It is a magical island that shifts from place to place wherever it is needed. The island is actually a series of volcanoes with its center an equine paradise. The border of the island is a thick layer of mist. Tir'Rielle is a thick forest with steaming warm hot pools, some waterfalls, crystals growing like plants from the ground and strange lights from fae that reside throughout the forest. The island's mistress is Tariel, a powerful shapeshifter and druidess. Normal animals talk, faeries flit all over and unicorns reside in the dales and forests. Tir'Rielle is guarded by the flying creatures, called the Skyguard and the landbound guardians who serve in many capacities. While in Tir'Rielle animals do not suffer illness. They cannot die from old age or the effects thereof. Old horses feel very young and everything is renewed and sustained by magic. The magic also makes food and drink relatively optional (basically, nothing can starve). Pure manavores (creatures that can sustain completely off of magic) no longer have to eat while in Tir'Rielle). Tir'Rielle also offers mundane and magical healings to sick and wounded animals. Note StephanieSmall if you or a character is in need of healing. Breeding Picture that Created this Horse: Starter More Pictures: None Art Creation Notes: I have created this art with a love of animals. I study animal anatomy and have taken lots of classes on animal anatomy of many types. -----------About Horseart RPG----------- Note me if you want to breed with my horses!! This is your personal invitation to enjoy a tour through the magical and mundane. See a breathtaking visual tour of ancient times and lands filled with trees, magical mushrooms, foliage, enchanted animals and awesome wizards. Let the splendor of unicorns, dragons, griffins, fairies, horses, the winged horse, Pegasus, and even the lone wolf lure you into a world of artistic exploration. Jump into a magical world! There is something beyond fantasy here. This is a mystical land just for you. If you like something real or mundane, Stephanie creates stunning domestic and wild animals. She studies biology and has a love of the ocean and wild animals. Horses, wolves, foxes, ponies, deer, dogs, cats, panthers, lions, fish, tigers and other creatures are some of the animals she draws. She has done animal pet portraits and is available for commission by emailing stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com for more information. Stephanie can be commissioned to do custom artwork including portraits of people, animals, homes or whatever your imagination can devise. She can do custom art as you as a pixie, fairy (faery) or mermaid too! Did you ever want to see yourself as a manga or anime character? Stephanie will do that! She can be commissioned to create a magical portrait of you! Stephanie creates art that features unicorns, mermaids, dragons, griffons and whatever fits her fancy. She can create cute, custom art for you that can be placed on a variety of Zazzle products such as Tshirts, blankets and more. Are you wanting your pet or child drawn? Want their picture on a blanket? Email Stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com for details. Stephanie Small is an artist located in California but she has spent time all over Oregon. Nature is an influential inspiration to Stephanie, as she seeks to augment and reflect what she sees around her in a variety of mediums. Inspired by medieval art, the fantasy and science fiction genre and more, Stephanie has developed a style of mythical realism. Stephanie uses a variety of styles and mixed mediums in her artwork. She regularly uses digital mediums such as Photoshop, Illustrator, Painter and more. She favors traditional mediums such as colored pencil, chalk, pen, ink, pencil, acrylic, watercolor. She has been known to adapt fabric, recycled art, recycled purses to create art that is both useful and stylish. Stephanie has been interviewed and featured in several magazines and websites. Her artwork has been published several times in books and magazines. She is best known for artwork featured in publications such as the Page, the Twisted Vine, the Unicorn and others. Her artwork will be featured on the cover of several upcoming books and publications. She often donates teaching, administrative assistance, research and artwork to many local non-profits. She has taught in-person and online classes on food preservation, writing, gardening, spirituality, unicorns, art and more. She has worked for (and with) the local government to initiate youth projects, senior events and business support. Stephanie loves unicorns and the horses she grew up with. It is clear in her art. She also loves mermaids. She even has a set of mermaid fins she can swim in. Stephanie Small finds inspiration in the animals of the ocean such as whales, orcas, narwhals and dolphins. Whether you are looking for a gift for girls, boys, men or women or whatever someone identify with, you will find something for everyone. Powerful images which have themes such as cute, goth, fantasy, wild animals, patterns, geometric designs, sacred symbols, pentagrams, realistic or more can all be commissioned and area available in current gallery images. Her products have been featured in pagan groups and wicca organizations. She embraces a variety of colors, favoring jewel tones (red, blue, green, purple) as well as more outgoing colors such as orange, yellow, pink, teal, green, violet or lavender, white and more. She provides many steampunk, medieval fantasy, black and gothic or cute anime and manga themed products. She is in the Society for Creative Anachronism ( SCA ) and is a member of the Vallejo Oddfellows as well as other non-profits. She has a veterinary assisting certificate which helps her by giving her a thorough education in anatomy and the natural world. She can also create images that recreate an emotion or event such as happy, sad, depression, love, joy, exhilaration, congratulations, birthday, holiday, Christmas, Halloween, Yule, Easter, Ostara, and whatever other holiday or celebration you can think of! You can purchase her merchandise from Clip Clop Workshop her website. If you are looking for a personalized gift, look no further! These unique and stunning pieces of work are available in a variety of pieces and many can be customized to your preference. Are you expecting? She has a bunch of great baby gifts available. You can find personalized wedding gifts, Christmas presents and stuff for him and for her! Looking for something for kids, well this art is geared to making them squeal with joy! You can find a variety of personalized birthday gifts, photo gifts and products that appeal to anyone! Stephanie has provided high end and unique quality items, as well as some more inexpensive and cheap items to fill stockings! Visit her Store! Many of her pieces are cute and fun. She loves to paint her pictures using a variety of colors, she often blends them together. Highlight of contrasting hues augment a variety of her pieces. Whether your favorite color is red, blue, yellow, pink, green, brown, orange, black or white, there is an image that will fit into your home and apparel desires. Stephanie has prepared a variety of images suitable for any occasion. You can explore her Zazzle page to find pillows, blankets, T-shirts, wooden gift boxes, necklaces, jewelry and clothing. These are available for birthday, Christmas, Yule, Easter, Ostara, Thanksgiving, Halloween, Veteran's Day, Solstices, Equinoxes, Eclipses and other holidays. Stephanie Small is also an actress and you will be able to see her in the upcoming series, 13 Reasons Why and several upcoming major motion pictures. She does voiceover, voiceacting, modeling and can also be hired for these services by emailing stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com Clip Clop Workshop: The Art of Stephanie Small and Kaia de Ocampo (married artists who own a motion graphic design company) CLIP CLOP WORK SHOP FACEBOOK CLIP CLOP WORK SHOP TWITTER GOOGLE PLUS LINKEDIN YOUTUBE BLOG CLIP CLOP WORKSHOP STORE (GO HERE TO BUY PRODUCTS OR CLICK ON A LINK BELOW) The Unique-CORN series: Express your inner unicorn (Goth unicorn, Cat Unicorn, Fairy Unicorn, Angel Unicorn and Dragon Unicorn) Magickal and Metaphysical: Spiritual Enlightenment Spiral Essence Unicorn and Griffon with Celtic Knot: Magickal Unicorn Moon Series: Bestselling Piece, My icon image Unicorn and Dragon Lovers Eternal Embrace Binders, T-shirts, blankets and more For the Goths: Gothic Fantasy: clothes and home decor Wolves, Dogs and Canines: clothes, blankets and more Griffons: wearable art Cats, Kittens, Panthers, Lions, Tigers and felines: blankets, pillows, T-shirts, cards and more Gift Ideas for all ages: and greeting cards too! description: Love is always love. Humans are always humans. A life is always a life... Until it ends.. I want to thank you all here now, 'cause I actually went around on peoples deviantARTs thanking you guys so much, I couldn't post more comments 'cause it thought I was spamming! ): So I'm sorry if I can not thank you personally at your profile, I really would if I could, and I will keep trying. Else just, throw in a comment and I'll thank you there!<3

description: We are more than our bodies, and our gender is defined by more than our sex. Souls have no gender or sex. This painting is my contribution to DeviantArt's Celebrate Pride Event! Find more info here: www.deviantart.com/journal/Cel… time's almost up! This piece is inspired by the purple tier, or spirit, and depicts a genderless person. I didn't initially enjoy this piece, as it felt a bit boring and dishonest, but as I continued to contemplate it while I worked, I believe it is now one of my favorites, though there are still aspects I'm unhappy with. I know it's not entirely purple, but I felt as though it needed some balance about it, and the red in the background and blue in the skin could combine to make purple?? Lol, but anyways I hope you enjoy it!

description: It's Time To....... Halloween!!!!!!!!! My entry for "Halloween Hoo Doo" Contest share by News: [link] After centuries, i finally made a Halloween theme! For a lot of people that ask me it... Do you happy, now?! You know, i don't like this day, but, in truth, is realllllllly ispiring! I'm so proud of this work... I try some experiments with colors and masking liquid... Yeah! Special dedication to dear who suggest me an autumn theme when i was in crisis of artistic ispiration... And because is one of people that ask me Halloween work! Take a look on his gallery... Daniel's Art is very amazing and emotional, and i'm sure you'll appreciated it! Another dedication to for continue support me... Especially, for to stand my madness, wuhauwuahwuahwuahwa! Print available here on deviantART (i looooove puzzleeee) and on my Zazzle Store! Oh my gosh..... Wow!! My "Genie In A Pumpkin" Mug received an award as TBA (Today's Best Awards Showcase) on Zazzle!!! I'm so honoured! Happiness!! Take a look: ? [link] ? Pleaseeeeeeeee..... Look the full view! I really hate this "blurred" effect of preview! description: Humble contribution to the pride month... All of us deserve to feel and show love, regardless of the gender ! Damn ! We're all human, so please bros', go give out love and tolerance around the world ! PS : Purple is my favorite color, so it's undertandable I choosed it ! o ----------------- o Humble contribution au mois consacré à la communauté LGBT... Tout le monde mérite de ressentir et d'exprimer son amour, et ce, quelque soit le genre de la personne ! Nom d'un ... ! Nous sommes tous des êtres humains, donc s'il-vous-plaît, bros', aller donc répandre un peu d'amour et de tolérance par delà le monde ! PS : le Violet est ma couleur favorite, il est donc compréhensible que je l'aie choisie !

description: Attention Odyssey Project mods! If you need this image in a larger size, please let me know! As I am selling prints, I have set it to not allow downloads of the large original image! ----- Just then, Paul's form began to shift. Sinew pulled itself to bone; blood pooled and seeped back into its rightful place. By the end, he looked every bit as he had been, save for one small difference – Paul was levitating a full foot off of the floor. Submission for the Odyssey II Project chapter 7 (runner up). Paul has been taken apart and put back together and I guess we're going to have the final showdown now. So the project is winding down. In all of my illustrations, I've been trying to keep the same kind of themes and styles without doing anything too repetitive, and I've been trying to stay away from a literal interpretation of the writing and add my own perspective to the art. It's been neat to do painting again, and to challenge myself and try and do some themes that I don't often do in my work. One last chapter to go, and we get extra long to work on it. Come on writers, you better give us something super fun to draw! Acrylic ink with stars added in photoshop. ----- Prologue [link] (runner up) Chapter 1 [link] (winner) Chapter 2 [link] (runner up) Chapter 3 [link] (runner up) Chapter 4 [link] Chapter 5 [link] (runner up) Chapter 6 [link] (winner) Chapter 8 [link] These are all available as prints.

description: "'Twas the night before Christmas, and all through the store...." The setting is Sweet Shoppe/Christmas Carol/R.C. Expansion Pack by Redhouse Studios. ArtyMotion's Genie Bottle shares the counter with Stonemason's (Stefan Morrell's) DecoClub table lamp. The clerk is CDI's (Capsces Digital Ink's) Kioki. The bugle and clerk's dress are by DAZ Productions. Hair is AprilYSH's Amarseda Hair. A few other elements are from Isaura Simon's (Isa's) Magic Shoppe. As usual, I tweaked textures - and the Christmas Carol's background - did the lighting and virtual camera work. Merry Christmas, happy holidays, or whatever seems appropriate.

description: Read it Pennsylvania Sunsets Emotion Project Total Awareness Same meaning as: Awareness Including: The Fight To Stop Animal Cruelty News Article DA Honors Spirit Day The Breast Cancer Awareness Month Imagine there's no Heaven It's easy if you try No hell below us Above us only sky Imagine all the people Living for today Imagine there's no countries It isn't hard to do Nothing to kill or die for And no religion too Imagine all the people Living life in peace You may say that I'm a dreamer But I'm not the only one I hope someday you'll join us And the world will be as one Imagine no possessions I wonder if you can No need for greed or hunger A brotherhood of man Imagine all the people Sharing all the world You may say that I'm a dreamer But I'm not the only one I hope someday you'll join us And the world will live as one. -Imagine-John Lennon -Imagine-John Lennon Tribute -Imagine-Dolly Parton "Just imagine a world, a world without sorrow, imagine a world, a bright tomorrow, imagine a world, with peace and love, now that's a world that I dream of"-Dolly Parton "Everyone dies anytime and anywhere. Even your love ones. And before that happens, say something that would appreciate them of who they are before they die..." -I received this quote today in a comment, and I have to say it's probably one of the best one's I've read. A fellow deviant said: "We need to treat one another with kindness and love no matter how we look and be. It's important that we be ourselves and be true to who we are and can become. No one deserves to be bullied....Love is what the world needs now..."-~celexana Wouldn't it be nice, if we could learn to live as one. description: I made this piece for DeviantArt's upcoming Pride Month project, for more infos check out the journal Celebrate Pride: Your Art, Our Pride FlagYour art can help inspire change! Choose a color from the Pride flag and use it to create a work of art that will be united into one extraordinary creation. Twitter Facebook Google+ Celebrate Pride: Share Your Art and Be Part of Our Community’s Pride Flag! Celebrate Pride: Share Your Art and Be Part of Our Community’s Pride Flag! June is LGBTQ+ Pride Month and DeviantArt is celebrating as a community. Create art in a rainbow of colors and we'll combine the pieces into one extraordinary Pride flag! There's something amazing about the individuals who make up the DeviantArt community. We are unlike any other community on Earth. Here… we can express ourselves — just as we are. <b> When you kiss the love of your life you are in harmony with him and in peace with yourself... WE CAN LOVE ANYONE. BOYS LOVE GIRLS, GIRLS LOVE BOYS, BOYS LOVE BOYS AND GIRLS LOVE GIRLS. YOU CANT JUDGE ANYONW BC OF THEIR SEXUALITY!! LOVE IS LOVE AND LOVE ALWAYS WINS!!! Hope you like it^^

description: This was a project for the DeviantArt Fan Art MAshup....It was pretty cool working on something like that...even though the topic I had wasn´t easy.... My randomly generated mashup was: BB8, in a cafe, being a hipster I´m not a hipster myslef...so I don´t actually know waht they do....So I mixed every cliché I know about them...wearing some beanies IN SUMMER.....and maybe some scarfs....What I do know for sure are the big glasses.....WITHOUT any glas... And offcourse sitting at Starbucks, writing a movie script on their MACbook... I have to admit its not my best Artwork so far, it was alot of fun Generate yours!

description: © Nameda Art All rights reserved This is for all of you my watchers who fave so often and comment regularly, for my friends, who support me, to those who inspire me, who help me to get better, who cheer me up when I am down, who lend me a shoulder for crying or are patient when I need to vent, for all of you who accept me as I am for my gangstas who help all the Angels, for the Angels who are just amazing for all the people who do care, who are honest, loyal, who are loving, straightforward, tolerant and openminded for those of you who don't give a S*** about what religion someone follows, what skin colour someone has, how someone looks, who don't care if someone is hetero, gay, lesbian or bi, who step in and open their mouth when injustice / wrong is done, who get beyond words into action where they see they can help Happy Valentines Day for all of you Chamuel and his Archaai Chamira (Charity) are the Archangels of Love divine, love, grace, compassion, creativity and mercy His name comes from the verb lenachem in Hebrew, which means comfort and compassion. Another interpretation of the name Chamuel is 'He who sees God'. He is often depicted in clothes or background of picture in colours of pink peach and gold colours you find in this rose, hence the title. Thanks for each and every . I have come to a point where it gets impossible to thank for all the faves personally. feel a little guilty, I rather take the time to create new art you hopefully will enjoy and which hopefully will inspire you, give you a smile at the right time, and work on my Project AWW, helping the true Angels get recognised for their kindness, than being continuously 1000+ messages behind. Be assured I am really and deeply grateful for every single fave and I will continue to answer any comment given. you all

description: -17- All the Best for DA’s 17th Anniversary! ----------------- I wanted to try something a little different; and, fit some of my favourite things about DA, into the template. There are so many fantastic Photomanipulators on DA; and, I’ve learned so much about digital art and editing, that I wanted to try something a little different. This combines some of the Line Art and Stock Artists, which I’m so grateful for; since joining DA. So, Happy Anniversary; and, many more, DA! ------------------ This is a variation on, Paint Your Wings (2015), which I coloured, based on DestinyBlue’s Paint your Wings Lineart (2011) and Remnants Lineart (2007); With a few new elements added, from Blue Peace, based on DestinyBlue’s Saving at Oielvert - lineart (2005) and Treasure Hunter Lineart (2009), done for DA Pride Flag, this year. ------------------ Thanks to the Line Artists and Stock Artists, and Group Administrators, and everyone, who are so generous, on DA. ------------------ Resources: DA 17th Birthday Template, by Patricio Betteo (betteo) Line Art: DestinyBlue’s Paint your Wings Lineart (2011) And, Remnants Lineart (2007); With elements from DestinyBlue’s Saving at Oielvert - lineart (2005) And, Treasure Hunter Lineart (2009) Memo: DestinyBlue’s finished pieces: Saving at Oeilvert (2004, “My first submission to DA… where it all began.”) Paint your Wings (2011) Anime eyes, by DestinyBlue ---------------- Other Resources: [Credits to follow. Depending on Lightening] Butterflies: Butterflies 5 PNG Stock, by Roy3D Butterflies silhouette, by TinaLouiseUk KymsCave-Stock Insects 01, by KymsCave-Stock Butterfly Swarm 04 PNG Stock, by Roy3D Butterfly (Papilio xuthus), by Jean52 Butterfly 3, by Jean52 Blue Butterfly by YBsilon-Stock, by YBsilon-Stock Blue-Yellow Butterfly by YBsilon-Stock, by YBsilon-Stock Butterfly, by TinaLouiseUk Butterfly, by artbykristian Butterfly, by makiskan Painted butterfly png, by TinaLouiseUk Butterfly fairy wings, by TinaLouiseUk Butterfly stock, by TheMysticWolf Butterfly Wing Stock 3, by SilentGod88 Fae: Flying fairy png, by Kibblywibbly Vine Fairy 5, by PirateLotus-Stock butterfly 8, by kayne-stock Ravens, and Other Creatures: Cut-out stock PNG 80 - Flying young crow, by Momotte2stocks Sleeping Black Cat PNG, by simfonic Crow Raven Bird Silhouette fly png, by RedRisingWolf FREE Flying Hgh Quality Dragon, by madetobeunique Other Resources: Rainbow Opacity 50 Stock, by AStoKo Easel, by mistyt-stock Sky stock pack, by TinaLouiseUk Sky Stock 05, by msfowle FOG/CLOUDS PNG, by Moonglowlilly Big Lens And Optical Flare Collection, by daWIIZ Window and Wooden House - PNG Stock, by Wesley-Souza* [*For The Canadian Corps of Engineers, for CREATIVE MINDS CHALLENGE IV, hosted by CD-STOCK] Software: Sketchbook Pro & 7 PSE10, Photoshop Elements 10 Hardware: Asus EP 121 Slate, asus Global Wacom Digitizer Pen [To Be Continued...] --------------------- Listening to: Grimes - Butterfly Loreena McKennitt - Lullaby (with lyrics) ---------------------- Thank you for your patience. Take Care and Stay safe. -Cat…

description: So, I saw the awesome L4D valentines, and was about to print them off to give to people at work, when I realized... Some of those people probably think an Xbox is something teenagers hide their porn in under the bed. I still was craving zombies, but I couldn't find anything without a video game reference. So, what the heck, I made some. My profuse apologies to my classmates at UCO... I used the mini-me's I made of everyone for the Senior Show as the bases of these guys. XD Don't take offense if little you is being eaten by a rabid zombie, I picked your models because they were cool lookin'. <3 I basically just wanted to do a retro-looking, cheesy, horrible sort of valentine that you used to get in shoeboxes in elementary school. Except, you know, with blood and guts. Hope you enjoy! Feel free to use them, if you want. If they upload at their full resolution, they should be standard 3"x4" cards at 300 dpi.

description: So yeah, this is the shocking truth behind PETA. Also, that info is all true, I've googled it all. Just google it yourselves if you don't believe me. For more info go to these sites, www.nokillnow.com/PETAIngridNe… www.nathanwinograd.com Here are some possible FAQs I'll answer. Q: Does PETA really kill animals? A: Yes thanks to the sites Nokillnow and Nathan Winogrand, both of these sites have undeniable proof PETA has killed more animals then they have saved. It was even on the news in 2005 where PETA employees were caught euthanizing animals in the back of a van. Data from these sites also reveal that PETA brought a walk in freezer in 2002, one which they paid over 9,300 dollars for. A walk in freezer would buy something that was maybe 15 by 10 feet. A freezer that size is normally used for storing meat and dairy products which nobody at PETA would be caught with. But a freezer that large would also be used to store dead bodies, which is further proof that they kill animals. Q: What do you mean by militant veganism? I thought being a vegan was healthy? A: PETA's goal is total animal liberation, meaning no more meat, milk, eggs, or honey for consumption. This would also mean no more leather, fur, wool, silk, fishing, service animals, zoos no matter how high the standards, horseback riding, temporary captivity for marine mammals (IE rehabbing whales and dolphins until they can go back to the ocean),aquariums, animals used in medical research, circuses that use animals, even if they are only domesticated, and pets. This can't happen because not everyone can go vegan. I have a friend who like many people is heavily allergic to nuts and peanuts and chances are soy and other beans could get cross contaminated so she needs to eat meat in order to get protein, and certain vitamins and minerals. Also, there are people out there who are also allergic to soy and nuts so going vegan is impossible in order to get the right amount of protein and fat. Also, many people who were former vegans went back to animal based food due to loosing too much weight, not getting enough nutrition, and the fact that it's expensive. Another friend of mine even tried to go vegan twice and she got sick both times. Other data even reveals that without some kind of healthy oil or fat in your diet you won't be able to absorb nutrients from the fruit and vegetables you eat. A good plant based fat comes from sources that are not always in season including coconuts, almonds, avocados, and olive oil. That and due to a lack of animal products a vegan diet is very low in the necessary iron, vitamin B12, and Omega3. Also, even if you were vegan that doesn't mean you can't consume high fructose corn syrup, soy lecithin, other GMO plants, or Indonesian forest destroying palm oil. You see the main problem with obesity is not only because we're eating factory farmed meat, it's also because we're also consuming things with GMO ingredients we can't even say with less than 4 syllables or even be pronounced by a third grader. Q: Do you support animal cruelty? A: No, I just stand for animal welfare, meaning that we use animals for what we normally use but there's no cruelty involved. I eat organic animal products, limit my fast food intake as much as possible, I don't buy real fur *its crazy expensive and gets way too dirty too easily* I refuse to eat anything endangered*Shark fin soup ring a bell?* or foiegras, and I refuse to purchase anything from a pet store that gets there puppies or kittens form mills, I don't go to wild animals circuses, I don't support life long captivity for whales, I hate bullfighting, I avoid food with palm oil in it to help protect the orangutans, and I feel animal testing for cosmetics is backwards. However, I do find leather an exception because the cows used are killed for their meat so every last bit of the animal is used and pleather is made from a non renewable resource, oil. Q:What domestic terrorism? A: The FBI and USDA have classified PETA as terrorist threats in the 2000s, it was in the news. PETA has used people such as Rodney Coronado to blow up medical research labs and even has ties to the ALF, another known domestic terrorist group Ingrid Newkirk herself has even said that she's the last person to condemn the ALF. More recently she sent a letter to James Holmes AKA the Aurora Colorado shooter that he will be less violent if he went vegetarian. They had even compared Oklahoma City bomber Tim McVeigh to Gandhi when he went vegetarian on his last meal. Q: But I thought eating meat was bad for the environment? A: Yes, if it's from factory farms, but a real pasture based organic farm no. What PETA doesn't want you to know is that even if the whole world went vegan the Amazon rainforest had many trees torn down for soy and corn. Soy is found in almost everything and the earth is gaining 80 million more people on average per year, we do have enough food to feed everyone but its given to factory farmed animals or turned into fuel, we could feed the world but it wouldn't be enough if everyone just had corn and soy to eat. Also, in the eyes of big agribusiness, supplies would be limited for so many people unless more tress are cut down, especially since most of this soy and corn is GMO. Over 30% of methane comes form mono cropped arsenic filled rice paddies, pleather is made from oil and synthetic fur is really made from nonrenewable resources and the factories where it's made releases toxic chemicals into the environment. Also, a huge chunk of vegan substitutes contain PALM OIL, usually associated with Indonesian rain forests being cut down or slashed and burned. This causes, human rights abuse for the indigenous people of Sumatra and Borneo, and the endangerment of Indonesian wild life including the orangutans and Sumatran tiger. Let's also not forget that most vegetarian food is often doused in toxic pesticides everyday to control weeds and bugs, and mono cropping with no crop rotation kills top soil and pollutes ground water. Also, one thing that is contributing to honey bees suffering from colony collapse disorder involve pesticides, GMOs and making them pollenate so many fruits and vegetables at once. So most vegan food will not save honey bees. Q: Other than what's listed here what other hypocrisy is there? A: One of their former vice presidents Mary Beth Sweetland who now works for the Humane Society is a type A diabetic that uses insulin tested on animals to stay alive. She feels she doesn't see herself as a hypocrite despite that she campaigned against medical testing on animals. How's that not Hypocritical? Also, Ellen Degeneres *Sp?* supports PETA but she did an ad for Covergirl and oil of Olay, companies that test their products on animals. Pink who did an ad against wool also was a spokes person for Covergirl later on and even openly admitted that she was not informed enough about wool. Joan Rivers supports PETA, but she wears FUR coats. Also, people who participated in the Ink not mink campaign forgot that most black tattoo ink is made from burnt animal bones. For more hypocrites go here. www.petawatch.com Q:If this info is out there then why do they get so much Money? A: Because they use scare tactics in order to trick people into giving them money. They don't go out and say that they are actually going to help animals, they say that they're going to stick the screws to the fur and meat industry and want you to believe what they say. Also, Charity Navigator has even given PETA just one star and reveals that most of the money they make goes towards making expensive advertisements, and protests while only 1% of their money actually goes to helping animals. And you thought that invisible children only donating around 30% of their money to helping children was a bad thing for them to do, these kids get at least about a couple million dollars. Compare that to PETA only donating 1% of their 33 million which is only about 4 to 330,000 dollars. Their main excuse to keep on killing animals is that they don't have the money to support them. Yeah, like 33 million dollars isn't enough money. Also, do you really think I'm lying about sexism? www.youtube.com/watch?v=m0vQOn… Also if you want to help animals, please buy organic and/or pasture raised meat,milk, honey and eggs. Donate to animal welfare groups like WSPA and try to help endangered animals by donating to environmental and wildlife animal protection groups, or take your time to sign petitions to create better welfare for animals and keep up to date with endangered animals. Update* Straight from the horses mouth about their support to the BSL. Their stance on pit bulls is, "We hope that our support of such laws will stop people from bringing more of these animals into the world to be hurt and exploited." This means that they feel all pit bull owners will raise them to be aggressive so they want these dogs to be banned form the planet. Update 2: Apparently Newkirk also feels that PETA is doing the best thing by euthanizing animals, and even claims that a recent article written by Nathan J Winogrand (a no kill advocate) is false and claims PETA to be a shelter of last resort, and not kill healthy animals. What she doesn't know is that this is not what no kill means, no kill means that you only kill the animals if they are suffering and can't be cured, also if they really are a shelter of last resort then how come she doesn't remember the time when perfectly healthy puppies and kittens were killed and put into a dumpster?

This painting is not much, It's just supposed to show support.

description: Neuter or spay your damned cat or else this is what happens. They multiply, more cats, less food, ugly fights. Taken in Haifa, Israel. This was NOT done by people!! The cat's ear has a form of cancer that makes it crumple, due to the brutal Israeli sun. The eye is the typical price these feral cats pay for their freedom. Some other cat must have clawed it, got infected and died off. Israelis treat the strays quite well, they give them food, water, shelter, and some bring them to the vet for neutering. So normally it's safe to assume injuries were not caused by human cruelty. If you credit me (Anna Giladi off site), you can use this for animal welfare purposes ONLY.

description: For the people who have been affected by the 2011 Earthquake and Tsunami that hit Japan and hit several countries in the Pacific as well as the past earthquake and tsunami victims everywhere. Magnitude of 8.9 on the Richter scale for the Japan's earthquake. Small islands as well as countries such as Philippines, Brazil, were hit by the waves following the tsunami. While Japan being the trendsetter for earthquake prevention and nuclear power technology, however this work is for the people in all the areas who are or will be affected. The idea of developing countries and low elevation areas being hit is pretty scary. I haven't forgotten the South Asian earthquake and tsunamis that occurred several years ago, and while they happened pretty far from where I lived, the horror of seeing people in my neighboring country and the chaos was really saddening. I am glad that the United Nations had said while they will wait for Japan to ask for help, however they will take pro-active initiative when the developing nations and areas are hit for this. Huge blast at Japan nuclear power plant Google Crisis Response Pray, donate whatever you can. Don't fight over the differences on what one should do or not do. Check out these news articles: Japan Hit by Massive Quake followed By Tsunami Earthquake and Tsunami Victims - 6 Ways to Help Support Japan Through Art and Funds at #fella Hope everyone is safe. While this scar won't be easy to erase or forget like the previous ones, but we must live on. Like the cycle of cherry blossoms.. Also deviants, stay safe. Earthquakes or otherwise. `snowmask said that while they are safe, her husband, `zerocomplex's hometown was hit, even if some friends contacted that they were okay, even if the aftershocks happened. Hope all the others are alright ._. Full painting Larger version will be uploaded soon only the model reference: sxc.hu Everything else is painted/my resources While it is titled Japan, it is due to the limited title length. Edit: Uploaded the signature less large version as a print. While I have never seen a print being sold in dA from my work, but should someone buy it, the part of the money I get will be donated. will update if that happens Edit 2:Moved to the Community Projects > Awareness > 2011 > Natural Disasters category. Didn't find it before and thanks to $Ayame-Kenoshi for her journal about it gaah for some reason i can't see it in the folder. I will submit again later to the category. >_>

description: PHEW. I just spent the past three hours blitzing through this one, since I really wanted to do something for Pride 2017 and get it in before 11:59pm, the deadline. Nothing like the last minute, am I right? *crooked grin* I'm definitely going to re-do this one, since my time limit didn't really allow me to make everything look 100% smooth and polished. It definitely needs a lot of tweaking. But it was a good learning experience, as far as being able to hash something halfway decent out in 3 hours or less. A huge challenge for me in my art is just the PAINSTAKING SLOWNESS with which I usually work. I'm super meticulous and like to take time applying all kinds of love and care to my work...which usually means I will be spending several days working on a piece such as this, if I even finish it at all. This was a great exercise in just getting stuff done without worrying too much about the details or the final product. And hey, didn't turn out half bad...though my inner critic/perfectionist is very, very grumpy... This is Yvonne and Chibi, my characters, two ladies very much in love. I chose the Blue theme for the Pride flag, which represents Harmony and Peace. I thought that fit this picture the best--Yvonne and her lady are almost always on the same page, harmonizing with each other's opposite personality. Yvonne is quiet, reserved, stoic, and calculating--typical Capricorn, really--while Chibi is effusive, bombastic, and playfully charming--typical Leo. The original sketch was in mechanical pencil, and the rest was done in Photoshop. I was going for a kind of retro look for these two. When I revisit it I might alter it to have a more nostalgic, 1960's oversaturated color scheme. Here's the webcomic these two are from.

description: For the LGBT+ Pride (Or as I prefer, something like GSRM, "Gender, Sexuality, and Romantic Minorities" to include asexuals, aromantics, genderqueer people who don't ID as trans, etc.) I like that all the prompts for pride month on DA have a spiritual tilt. The dragon design is based on the reptile's parietal eye, which is a literal third eye on their heads that helps regulate wake and sleep cycles. It does not have vision, but it is photosensitive. The analogous structure in a human is our pineal gland in the middle of our brain. This dragon's scale pattern takes direct inspiration from this picture of an iguana with his "third eye": www.anapsid.org/images/parieta… All real animal species depicted here are hermaphroditic. Snails permanently, and these specific fish can switch. Read more about it here: reefbuilders.com/2014/11/13/se… Top corners: Lubbock's Fairy Wrasse, i.e., Cirrhilabrus lubbocki en.microcosmaquariumexplorer.c… Yes, the ruddy fish are relatives to clownfish. Hybrids of them, in fact. Amphiprion ocellaris and Premnas biaculeatus www.advancedaquarist.com/2012/… Scary lookin' carnivorous sailfish that have a dinosaur reminiscence: Alepisaurus ferox www.google.com/search?q=Alepis…: Bottom corner: Whitetail Angelfish, i.e., Centropyge fisheri fishesofaustralia.net.au/home/… Snails: Pomacea bridgesii, purple color morph I wanted to include this guy, too, but ran out of room: www.google.com/search?q=Hypopl…: Help me decide which dragon to do next, or use my doodles to make your own: menollysagittaria.deviantart.c…

description: I You happy Valentine's day I love you baby, With all my might, I want to kiss you, And hold you tight. But when you love something they say set if free, And if it doesn’t come back it wasn’t meant to be. But I don’t want to let you go, Don’t want to give you the key. I guess I just love you too much To ever set you free. I love you baby, So please stay with me, Please be my Valentine, Please always love me. Cause I’ll always love you, Now and forever, Till time and space implode, My heart’s yours now till never. My favourite memory always our first kiss, Baby, you are the only thing I ever really miss. I love you. (c)This character, the story/manga he comes from, this drawing and the poem all belongs to me and were created by me. 14/02/2013

description: Ultra Fractal 5.04 Jesus said we are to love others as we love ourselves. We are all created in the image of God and NO ONE has the right to bully another. Words DO hurt us regardless of that little school yard ditty that says that sticks and stones are the only things that do. And apologies don't help. Bullying is like driving a nail in wood with a hammer. We can pull out the nail but the hole is still there! Don't be a hole giver, because you might be on the receiving end some day. I was bullied as a child and I can still remember some of the incidences almost like they were just yesterday, even after all these years. We are very diverse, but we are all human under the skin. Before you say or do cruel things to another, try to see yourself in them. I would like to thank anyone who faves my work ahead of time. Your comments and favorites are very important to me, and I cherish them all . I promise to try to respond to comments, but I can no longer keep up with individual thanks. My images are NOT stock images! Do not alter, redistribute, reproduce, upload on another server and/or website, display on another website, or otherwise use any of these images without receiving MY PERMISSION, first. All works in this gallery are Copyright © 2008, 2009, 2010 to Shadoweddancer aka C. Miller. Unauthorized uploads to wallpaper websites or other peer-to-peer sharing websites will be assessed a processing fee and licensing fees to both the uploader and to the hosting site. Repeated, gross violations will be subject to litigation.

description: Star Wars vs Star Trek. Hetalia vs Homestuck. Twilight vs. Harry Potter Warrior Cats, Eragon, His Dark Materials, How to Train Your Dragon, Lord of the Rings, Minecraft, Evony, Maplestory, Dragon Cave, Neopets, Pokemon, Digimon, Final Fantasy, Kuroshitsuji, My Little Pony, Batman, Death Note, Superman, X Men, Naruto, Avatar... FANDOMS. You can't get away from them. They are everywhere. And no matter how much you love them or hate them, they will always be there. And not everyone likes the same things. Get over it. Why should there even be a 'vs' issue? Why can't people like both? Or neither? Why is it so horrible for anyone to have a different opinion? Everyone that bashes other fandoms just makes their own look like shit--which gives the other side reason to bash you, too. If someone hates on your fandom, there is a reason. Listen to it. Savour it like a piece of bad gristle. Think long and hard about it. Have you been a good example for your beloved drug of choice? Or have you been the asshole everyone despises, ruthlessly hacking anyone who thinks differently to bits? There is no excuse to flame someone for being different. There is no excuse to call in your friends to tell that person how horrible they are. There is no excuse to send them hate mail. There is just no excuse at all when you are being the very creature you resent. It's fine to hate the work, but not the people who love it. Just /think</ about your behaviour for a minute. And then, tell the other side why they're right. That's right, you heard me. Tell them they were right. And then, while they're still dazed (because Confusion was EXTREMELY EFFECTIVE), tell them what you still love about yours anyway, and then ask them to share their love for theirs. Make love, not war. ~*~*~*~*~ Brushes taken from sites listen on main gallery page (not profile page)

description: As a gay transgender person, how could I not support Spirit Day? Please, if you're feeling blue about how people treat you, remember you are not alone. A lot of us older folks have gone through a lot of the same difficulties as you, and a lot of people your age are currently going through it. I promise you, it does get better! If you want a completely non-judgmental friend and therapist, animals are great - they never judge you for who you are, they love you unconditionally!

description: This is an attempt to explain to straight people what it is like to be lesbian (or any other part of the gay community). We are brought up to be straight, expected to be straight, and yet our hearts are not happy in the straight world. Once outside of the straight world, we find a world of beauty and freedom...something that the straight people cannot see, because they are not outside of their world. Their sight is limited to what they see, what they know. We have seen both worlds, and we love the freedom and beauty that is visible only to us.

description: My Mii-Cat aka Lucymia died at the clinic today. After 13 years of being my most loyal little sidekick and the loveliest silly cat, she just suddenly died when we were so close to finding what was wrong with her. I have a huge empty hole where my heart was only hours ago. My world just ended and it's name was Lucymia. Here's what happened: after a surgery to remove plaque and unidentified masses, she first seemed to recover just fine. Then suddenly, after a few days, it went downhill. My puffer fish had escaped from its tank and grazed Lucy. She didn't bite or scratch it, but I still worried about external venom, so I contacted puffer fish experts and emergency vet services. They all told me that captive freshwater puffers are not dangerous. So I let it go. But she stopped eating, drinking, washing and sleeping in my bed with me. I took her to the vet who had removed those other things before. She told me that I needed to get rid of the new kitten, Orli-Pompom, because Lucy was just jealous/stressed/depressed. But a depressed cat can walk. Lucy couldn't, so I took her to my friend's vet. On the way there, she had gotten much worse. When I took her out of the carrier, she walked in a circle, then collapsed. The vet didn't have the proper equipment and sent me to his colleague who runs a hyper-equipped clinic. That vet then tested Lucy for FIV (feline Aids), did a blood screen etc., and for one, found a pneumonia. He also took x-rays because her kidney had enlarged all of a sudden and her lung wasn't good either. Also her heart was disrupted. Lucy had trouble breathing, so he put her in an oxygen tank. I'm on bad terms with G-d so I asked my orthodox friend to pray for my Mii-Cat and he did. He must have blurted out my name, because the vet came out and told me he may have to resucitate any moment. And he did, he intubated and tried everything, but a moment later, he came back again and only said "I'm sorry". I asked him to do a post-mortem exam to find out what took my lovely Mii-Cat from me but I think I knew it was the neurological form of FIP. Update: The autopsy report stated that she died from a congenital heart condition.

description: This was specifically made for pride month, representing orange on the flag or healing. Now when I really thought about healing I saw it more of a physical and mental representation in my artwork. A father who has lost his ability to walk finds himself stuck in a depression where he can't play with children, walk with his eldest son, or even dance with his partner. Only until he has received his prosthetics does he start his slow journey of recovery or healing. That was my main idea to what the picture is about and the healing process that is displays. All these characters are mine except the man of honor, the red haired male. He belongs to my girlfriend while everyone else belongs to me. Hopefully this is good enough for the pride days flag ^^

description: Request for Taismo-89. I was so glad to color yet another drawing of my TMNT fanart. You may remember this drawing that I did just before Valentine's Day. Digitally colored entirely with Paint and PhotoShop. Behind this drawing, it's Valentine's Day, and Donatello wants to give a gift for April. A bouquet of roses, which is a modern Valentine's gift. Once Donnie gave her the roses, April set them down, stands on her heels to reach Donnie's lips, he bends his legs to reach her lips, and they are finally kissing. Donnie even wraps his arms around her to balance her. The marks on their cheeks is them blushing. Donnie is beautifully colored, also April, and her bouquet of roses. I thought that April's hair should be detailed like I do with my drawings, I made every strand from her bangs and her short pony tail. If you want more digital-colored drawings from me, please let me know. Here's the uncolored version: [link] Hope you like it! description: For contest "I am NOT for sale." [link] According to U.S. government estimates, thousands of men, women, and children are trafficked to the United States for the purposes of sexual and labor exploitation. An unknown number of U.S. citizens and legal residents are trafficked within the country primarily for sexual servitude and, to a lesser extent, forced labor. As much as we in America do not want to recognize it, children are now being treated like a commodity on the black market. Sometimes they are simply relocated within their own country. More often they are moved across borders. They are sold for purposes like forced labor, prostitution, pornography, organ removal, or even as child soldiers. They are in high demand as cheap domestic labor, for farm work, and especially for sexual exploitation. Some girls, as young as 13 years of age, are sold as mail-order brides where they are isolated, abused, raped, and subjected to various forms of torture. Unfortunately, child trafficking has become a lucrative business that is directly linked with highly organized criminal activity. It is well hidden underground and very difficult to find and deal with. This makes even the strictest laws against child trafficking hard to enforce. Do somthing [link]

description: "An angel can't be tainted. Let the punishment fall on me. To keep you forever innocent..." [My dear girl, when will you know, loving somebody, anybody, is not a sin.] . . . It is the illustration of a short story I wrote about 5-6 years ago, which was based on a dream I had got at night. There were two friends, both girls, named Sa and Huyen, Sa was cute and innocent since Huyen was cold and hateful. Sa's lover left her, she fell apart and went to cry to Huyen, Huyen was angry and said let her be Sa's lover instead. They then really did, to Sa it was just a play, pretending game, but Huyen, didn't know when, started to fall in love with Sa and she, of course, was all torn up because of that. Finally, Sa's lover came back and asked her to go with him, Sa accepted and happily told Huyen. Huyen was broken, hardly broken. She let Sa go, telling her nothing. She wished to keep Sa innocent forever. I don't know why I dreamed that, but I felt the hurting soul of Huyen, it did hurt, too much. I think loving somebody is never a sin. I wish Huyen is real to tell her that. . . . Tribute to Spirit Day of DA, a quick sketch with watercolor pencils. L??t qua gal m?i phát hi?n ra mình v? 2 tranh liên t?c toàn tím h?ng m?t cách trùng h?p =]] !!Commission start with just $1.5!! Details=>>[link] Thank you for helping :"D ! LC

description: You know, there's a story behind this. This is an old art from 2011. I actually managed to join an irl contest (I forgot what) but I missed the deadline by MINUTES cos school was really killing me as a 12th grader and my internet was a retard (tried hours sending this, thought I succeed but found out in last minutes that the sending FAILED), so......... lol you get the story. I think my entry wasn't even sent. HAHAHA A year later, I decided to submit this here cos I really don't care about it anymore. I already got over it. I did that in rush anyway (because I really had no time), maybe my effort just didn't worth it lol or maybe my internet didn't let me join the contest Didn't even want to edit it again. Everytime I remember my struggle and dark years in science major, I want to laugh.... lol I'm so much happier today since the exams ended last month

Tir'Rielle Island HorseArt Stable D&D Gygaxian Steed * Eclipquines Disciplines My WolfArt-RPG * My CatArt * My Hybrids TIR'RIELLE ISLAND HORSEART STABLE | Tir'Rielle Island HORSEART Journal | Breeding Studs and Stallions | Broodmares | All Male Equines (Includes Sterile) | All Female Equines (Includes Sterile) | My HORSEART Breeding Gallery | All Breeding Pictures & Foals (Faves) MY HORSEART BREED GALLERIES Gygaxian Steed Gygaxian Steed Breed Sheet (Breed Creators/Owners: Shayla-Estate, StephanieSmall) Eclipquines Eclipquine Breed Sheet (Breed Creators/Owners: Jakedau,Help-4-homles-frends,StephanieSmall) Prisma Paint Prisma Paint Breed Sheet (Breed Creator: DancingDragonStables Breed Owner: StephanieSmall) HORSEART SISTER GAMES Tir'Rielle Island Feline Sanctuary CatArt RPG | Tir'Rielle Wolf Sanctuary WolfArt-RPG Journal | Tir'Rielle Wolf Sanctuary WolfArt-RPG Gallery | My Hybrid Art Game Journal | My Hybrid Art Game Gallery OTHER BREEDS Felshae Shapeshifting Winged Cats ARTIST BIOGRAPHY The Art of Stephanie Small is a complex blend of mythical and real. This is your personal invitation to enjoy a tour through the magical and mundane. See a breathtaking visual tour of ancient times and lands filled with trees, magical mushrooms, foliage, enchanted animals and awesome wizards. Let the splendor of unicorns, dragons, griffins, fairies, horses, the winged horse, Pegasus, and even the lone wolf lure you into a world of artistic exploration. Jump into a magical world! There is something beyond fantasy here. This is a mystical land just for you. If you like something real or mundane, Stephanie creates stunning domestic and wild animals. She studies biology and has a love of the ocean and wild animals. Horses, wolves, foxes, ponies, deer, dogs, cats, panthers, lions, fish, tigers and other creatures are some of the animals she draws. She has done animal pet portraits and is available for commission by emailing stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com for more information. Stephanie can be commissioned to do custom artwork including portraits of people, animals, homes or whatever your imagination can devise. She can do custom art as you as a pixie, fairy (faery) or mermaid too! Did you ever want to see yourself as a manga or anime character? Stephanie will do that! She can be commissioned to create a magical portrait of you! Stephanie creates art that features unicorns, mermaids, dragons, griffons and whatever fits her fancy. She can create cute, custom art for you that can be placed on a variety of Zazzle products such as Tshirts, blankets and more. Are you wanting your pet or child drawn? Want their picture on a blanket? Email Stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com for details. Stephanie Small is an artist located in California but she has spent time all over Oregon. Nature is an influential inspiration to Stephanie, as she seeks to augment and reflect what she sees around her in a variety of mediums. Inspired by medieval art, the fantasy and science fiction genre and more, Stephanie has developed a style of mythical realism. Stephanie uses a variety of styles and mixed mediums in her artwork. She regularly uses digital mediums such as Photoshop, Illustrator, Painter and more. She favors traditional mediums such as colored pencil, chalk, pen, ink, pencil, acrylic, watercolor. She has been known to adapt fabric, recycled art, recycled purses to create art that is both useful and stylish. Stephanie has been interviewed and featured in several magazines and websites. Her artwork has been published several times in books and magazines. She is best known for artwork featured in publications such as the Page, the Twisted Vine, the Unicorn and others. Her artwork will be featured on the cover of several upcoming books and publications. She often donates teaching, administrative assistance, research and artwork to many local non-profits. She has taught in-person and online classes on food preservation, writing, gardening, spirituality, unicorns, art and more. She has worked for (and with) the local government to initiate youth projects, senior events and business support. Stephanie loves unicorns and the horses she grew up with. It is clear in her art. She also loves mermaids. She even has a set of mermaid fins she can swim in. Stephanie Small finds inspiration in the animals of the ocean such as whales, orcas, narwhals and dolphins. Whether you are looking for a gift for girls, boys, men or women or whatever someone identify with, you will find something for everyone. Powerful images which have themes such as cute, goth, fantasy, wild animals, patterns, geometric designs, sacred symbols, pentagrams, realistic or more can all be commissioned and area available in current gallery images. Her products have been featured in pagan groups and wicca organizations. She embraces a variety of colors, favoring jewel tones (red, blue, green, purple) as well as more outgoing colors such as orange, yellow, pink, teal, green, violet or lavender, white and more. She provides many steampunk, medieval fantasy, black and gothic or cute anime and manga themed products. She is in the Society for Creative Anachronism ( SCA ) and is a member of the Vallejo Oddfellows as well as other non-profits. She has a veterinary assisting certificate which helps her by giving her a thorough education in anatomy and the natural world. She can also create images that recreate an emotion or event such as happy, sad, depression, love, joy, exhilaration, congratulations, birthday, holiday, Christmas, Halloween, Yule, Easter, Ostara, and whatever other holiday or celebration you can think of! You can purchase her merchandise from Clip Clop Workshop her website. If you are looking for a personalized gift, look no further! These unique and stunning pieces of work are available in a variety of pieces and many can be customized to your preference. Are you expecting? She has a bunch of great baby gifts available. You can find personalized wedding gifts, Christmas presents and stuff for him and for her! Looking for something for kids, well this art is geared to making them squeal with joy! You can find a variety of personalized birthday gifts, photo gifts and products that appeal to anyone! Stephanie has provided high end and unique quality items, as well as some more inexpensive and cheap items to fill stockings! Visit her Store! Many of her pieces are cute and fun. She loves to paint her pictures using a variety of colors, she often blends them together. Highlight of contrasting hues augment a variety of her pieces. Whether your favorite color is red, blue, yellow, pink, green, brown, orange, black or white, there is an image that will fit into your home and apparel desires. Stephanie has prepared a variety of images suitable for any occasion. You can explore her Zazzle page to find pillows, blankets, T-shirts, wooden gift boxes, necklaces, jewelry and clothing. These are available for birthday, Christmas, Yule, Easter, Ostara, Thanksgiving, Halloween, Veteran's Day, Solstices, Equinoxes, Eclipses and other holidays. Stephanie Small is also an actress and you will be able to see her in the upcoming series, 13 Reasons Why and several upcoming major motion pictures. She does voiceover, voiceacting, modeling and can also be hired for these services by emailing stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com Clip Clop Workshop: The Art of Stephanie Small and Kaia de Ocampo (married artists who own a motion graphic design company) CLIP CLOP WORK SHOP FACEBOOK CLIP CLOP WORK SHOP TWITTER GOOGLE PLUS LINKEDIN YOUTUBE BLOG CLIP CLOP WORKSHOP STORE (GO HERE TO BUY PRODUCTS OR CLICK ON A LINK BELOW) The Unique-CORN series: Express your inner unicorn (Goth unicorn, Cat Unicorn, Fairy Unicorn, Angel Unicorn and Dragon Unicorn) Magickal and Metaphysical: Spiritual Enlightenment Spiral Essence Unicorn and Griffon with Celtic Knot: Magickal Unicorn Moon Series: Bestselling Piece, My icon image Unicorn and Dragon Lovers Eternal Embrace Binders, T-shirts, blankets and more For the Goths: Gothic Fantasy: clothes and home decor Wolves, Dogs and Canines: clothes, blankets and more Griffons: wearable art Cats, Kittens, Panthers, Lions, Tigers and felines: blankets, pillows, T-shirts, cards and more Gift Ideas for all ages: and greeting cards too! description: Sooooo.... Here it is! Bracken X Soot! I don't mean Braceknfur and Sootwhisker from Warriors, but Bracken is GreenGummies's Oc, and we share Soot. They come from an RP we started while at a school camping trip, my name there was Pine(female), because I saw this pretty pine tree, and GreenGummies picked Bracken (male), so then we created ocs out of them, and started RP with them. They lived together for a long time as best friends on the moor, then one day, Bracken started exploring a mountain nearby, met Soot's father (Ashes) and was scared by him. Later on, Pine and Bracken encounter Soot. Now Pine being that protective and aggressive cat she is, she fought Soot and chased him away. Bracken later on went after him, brought him back, and Ashes soon came along. It turns out Ashes and Soot were part of a Rebellion Group (led by Pine's father, Oak), and were chased away and separated because of the cats they rebelled against. Later on, Bracken and Soot started getting closer, and Pine started accepting the new cats, even though Ashes practically sleeps all day. I used the color blue because it represents the peace and harmony that developed between the cats over time.

description: HOHOHOHOOHOHO MERRY CHRISTMAS MINNA!! LOOK WHAT SANTA DREW FOR YOU So this is basically heatshot sketch of the ocs of my friends and people who interacted with me this year. description: This is aimed towards anorexia, bulimia, or to anyone obsessed with their physical appearance. I realize that the photo is dark, and you cannot see the models face. Some of you caught on to the purpose for this right away, but for those of you who didn't: The purpose for this is to send the message of starvation, and to speak to a group of people-not just the model. This photo was not intended to show off her eating dissorder, it if for others to see themselves through her. Hope that makes sense n_n' Model: Comment. Fave <3

description: On a beautiful day King Julien walk in the jungle. One day, Maurice and Mort came running towards it. "Good morning, your highness," said Maurice, and he took a bow. "Good morning, Maurice," said Julien. "Julien say you know what today is?" Said Maurice. "Uh no?" Asked Julien surprised. "Today is Valentine day!" "Ooh ... but ... what is Valentine's Day? He asked. "It's a day of love!" "But by whom?" "By Cupid the god of love!" Said Maurice ... "But how do you know?" Asked King Julien surprised. "I've read from the Book of Myths" "YES! And I'm in love on your feet! "Said Mort and he jumped straight to King Julien's feet. "Hey Stay away from my Royal feet! Julien said angry. "Good morning, your majesty! There is something very strange in the jungle? "Said Clover. "Oh, good morning Clover Today is Valentine day," said Julien proud "Valentine's Day?" Asked Clover surprised. "What is that? it is sometimes do with revolution? Or the end of the world or is it evil word? "Said Clover .." Wow! easy Clover That is certainly not true! "It's a day of love," said Maurice. "Love? Wait a minute? This may be deadly !! I must stop love !! "said Clover and she runs like a rocket to the Lemurs valley to stop love. now Clover do not realy know what for valentine day is, "No, wait!" Said Julien "Maurice do something!" "Who me? It's your fault? You have to stop her! "" Who me?? But how? " "Here's your flower and the arrows," said Mort. "Mort? How do you get those arrows? "Asked Julien" From that got flying babies! of course"" That's Right! "Said Maurice. "Give me the arrow that because then I can at her and then she will be love at first sight!" "And what do I do?" Asked Julien. "You must stop her! Here take a few flowers and gave to hurry Clover quickly! "And So Julien went to Clover. Clover was almost at the Lemurs valley but ..... "Clover wait! I have something for you ..... "gasps Julien. "Ha! Let me guess? You happen to have a bomb in your hand right? "Laughs Clover. "What? Oh course not! I have for you a honeydew "" A honeydew? Ha! Do not make me laugh! I do have .... Huh? ... What did you say that? "Asked Clover surprised. "Is that honeydew of me?" "Yes ah yes, of course!" Said Julien nervous. "But why? Are you sometimes? .. PIEUW ..... Ouch! Who did that? I'm going to punch on his face and I break ..... ooooh. I feel something weird it looks as if I fell in love with the flowers? And the three boys! "Phew ... And so it happens. Mort obviously had a bow and arrow from Cubido shot so that she falls in love. Clover is finally calmed Happy Valentine's Day King Julien, Clover Maurice and Mort!

description: Using the seashell as a symbol the different interpretations of the two minds: Pink being the Dyslexic and blue the "Normal" the sides are the same, yet different, with the "Perfect image" of the shell coming from the "Normal" Mind's shell, and bubbles of uncertainty and confusion coming from the Dyslexic mind. This bold poster was made by my (late) Mum, who lived with Numeric Dyslexia and other Mental illnesses,. Any profit will be donated to the New Zealand Dyslexia Foundation ( [link] ) To see the Plan click here -> [link]
