description: ((edited the file to make it more yellow)) - It can be hard holding everything in, especially when some may not consider you "normal." Sometimes, holding it in can burn holes in you and cause excruciating pain, but if you're able to let it out, even just a little, it helps relieve the pressure and it can energize you and perhaps even light up others' lives. - I'm not sure if this will count under it but this is kind of my entry for Deviantart's LGBT+ Pride Month event... thing? I chose yellow, representing sunlight and energy. It's still sunlight if it comes from within, right? :T - Time taken: 3-ish hours? Reference used. alt. versions: Website | Instagram | Tumblr | Furaffinity | Facebook | Twitter

description: No matter what I'll be the mirror of your heart - Ode to our Soul - Every nice feeling deserves an ode, and "empathy" is one of the most important parts of one's soul. By using the empathy, one soul can connect the other and feel the same. Maybe the other person doesn't know how strong the connection is, but that soul will be there helping that person no matter what happens. Those hearts become one, just like a mirror, with unconditional love. Use empathy

description: STEPHANIE SMALL ARTIST AND ACTRESS stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com * Clip Clop Workshop WITH YOU I FELT THE TIDE: Poetry and Fantasy Art, an E-Book Artist Info Commission Info * Contest Info Trades/Gifts to Me! * Trades/Gifts from Me! Tir'Rielle Island HorseArt Stable D&D Gygaxian Steed * Eclipquines Disciplines My WolfArt-RPG * My CatArt * My Hybrids TIR'RIELLE ISLAND HORSEART STABLE | Tir'Rielle Island HORSEART Journal | Breeding Studs and Stallions | Broodmares | All Male Equines (Includes Sterile) | All Female Equines (Includes Sterile) | My HORSEART Breeding Gallery | All Breeding Pictures & Foals (Faves) MY HORSEART BREED GALLERIES Gygaxian Steed Gygaxian Steed Breed Sheet (Breed Creators/Owners: Shayla-Estate, StephanieSmall) Eclipquines Eclipquine Breed Sheet (Breed Creators/Owners: Jakedau,Help-4-homles-frends,StephanieSmall) Prisma Paint Prisma Paint Breed Sheet (Breed Creator: DancingDragonStables Breed Owner: StephanieSmall) HORSEART SISTER GAMES Tir'Rielle Island Feline Sanctuary CatArt RPG | Tir'Rielle Wolf Sanctuary WolfArt-RPG Journal | Tir'Rielle Wolf Sanctuary WolfArt-RPG Gallery | My Hybrid Art Game Journal | My Hybrid Art Game Gallery OTHER BREEDS Felshae Shapeshifting Winged Cats ARTIST BIOGRAPHY The Art of Stephanie Small is a complex blend of mythical and real. This is your personal invitation to enjoy a tour through the magical and mundane. See a breathtaking visual tour of ancient times and lands filled with trees, magical mushrooms, foliage, enchanted animals and awesome wizards. Let the splendor of unicorns, dragons, griffins, fairies, horses, the winged horse, Pegasus, and even the lone wolf lure you into a world of artistic exploration. Jump into a magical world! There is something beyond fantasy here. This is a mystical land just for you. If you like something real or mundane, Stephanie creates stunning domestic and wild animals. She studies biology and has a love of the ocean and wild animals. Horses, wolves, foxes, ponies, deer, dogs, cats, panthers, lions, fish, tigers and other creatures are some of the animals she draws. She has done animal pet portraits and is available for commission by emailing stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com for more information. Stephanie can be commissioned to do custom artwork including portraits of people, animals, homes or whatever your imagination can devise. She can do custom art as you as a pixie, fairy (faery) or mermaid too! Did you ever want to see yourself as a manga or anime character? Stephanie will do that! She can be commissioned to create a magical portrait of you! Stephanie creates art that features unicorns, mermaids, dragons, griffons and whatever fits her fancy. She can create cute, custom art for you that can be placed on a variety of Zazzle products such as Tshirts, blankets and more. Are you wanting your pet or child drawn? Want their picture on a blanket? Email Stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com for details. Stephanie Small is an artist located in California but she has spent time all over Oregon. Nature is an influential inspiration to Stephanie, as she seeks to augment and reflect what she sees around her in a variety of mediums. Inspired by medieval art, the fantasy and science fiction genre and more, Stephanie has developed a style of mythical realism. Stephanie uses a variety of styles and mixed mediums in her artwork. She regularly uses digital mediums such as Photoshop, Illustrator, Painter and more. She favors traditional mediums such as colored pencil, chalk, pen, ink, pencil, acrylic, watercolor. She has been known to adapt fabric, recycled art, recycled purses to create art that is both useful and stylish. Stephanie has been interviewed and featured in several magazines and websites. Her artwork has been published several times in books and magazines. She is best known for artwork featured in publications such as the Page, the Twisted Vine, the Unicorn and others. Her artwork will be featured on the cover of several upcoming books and publications. She often donates teaching, administrative assistance, research and artwork to many local non-profits. She has taught in-person and online classes on food preservation, writing, gardening, spirituality, unicorns, art and more. She has worked for (and with) the local government to initiate youth projects, senior events and business support. Stephanie loves unicorns and the horses she grew up with. It is clear in her art. She also loves mermaids. She even has a set of mermaid fins she can swim in. Stephanie Small finds inspiration in the animals of the ocean such as whales, orcas, narwhals and dolphins. Whether you are looking for a gift for girls, boys, men or women or whatever someone identify with, you will find something for everyone. Powerful images which have themes such as cute, goth, fantasy, wild animals, patterns, geometric designs, sacred symbols, pentagrams, realistic or more can all be commissioned and area available in current gallery images. Her products have been featured in pagan groups and wicca organizations. She embraces a variety of colors, favoring jewel tones (red, blue, green, purple) as well as more outgoing colors such as orange, yellow, pink, teal, green, violet or lavender, white and more. She provides many steampunk, medieval fantasy, black and gothic or cute anime and manga themed products. She is in the Society for Creative Anachronism ( SCA ) and is a member of the Vallejo Oddfellows as well as other non-profits. She has a veterinary assisting certificate which helps her by giving her a thorough education in anatomy and the natural world. She can also create images that recreate an emotion or event such as happy, sad, depression, love, joy, exhilaration, congratulations, birthday, holiday, Christmas, Halloween, Yule, Easter, Ostara, and whatever other holiday or celebration you can think of! You can purchase her merchandise from Clip Clop Workshop her website. If you are looking for a personalized gift, look no further! These unique and stunning pieces of work are available in a variety of pieces and many can be customized to your preference. Are you expecting? She has a bunch of great baby gifts available. You can find personalized wedding gifts, Christmas presents and stuff for him and for her! Looking for something for kids, well this art is geared to making them squeal with joy! You can find a variety of personalized birthday gifts, photo gifts and products that appeal to anyone! Stephanie has provided high end and unique quality items, as well as some more inexpensive and cheap items to fill stockings! Visit her Store! Many of her pieces are cute and fun. She loves to paint her pictures using a variety of colors, she often blends them together. Highlight of contrasting hues augment a variety of her pieces. Whether your favorite color is red, blue, yellow, pink, green, brown, orange, black or white, there is an image that will fit into your home and apparel desires. Stephanie has prepared a variety of images suitable for any occasion. You can explore her Zazzle page to find pillows, blankets, T-shirts, wooden gift boxes, necklaces, jewelry and clothing. These are available for birthday, Christmas, Yule, Easter, Ostara, Thanksgiving, Halloween, Veteran's Day, Solstices, Equinoxes, Eclipses and other holidays. Stephanie Small is also an actress and you will be able to see her in the upcoming series, 13 Reasons Why and several upcoming major motion pictures. She does voiceover, voiceacting, modeling and can also be hired for these services by emailing stephanie@clipclopworkshop.com Clip Clop Workshop: The Art of Stephanie Small and Kaia de Ocampo (married artists who own a motion graphic design company) CLIP CLOP WORK SHOP FACEBOOK CLIP CLOP WORK SHOP TWITTER GOOGLE PLUS LINKEDIN YOUTUBE BLOG CLIP CLOP WORKSHOP STORE (GO HERE TO BUY PRODUCTS OR CLICK ON A LINK BELOW) The Unique-CORN series: Express your inner unicorn (Goth unicorn, Cat Unicorn, Fairy Unicorn, Angel Unicorn and Dragon Unicorn) Magickal and Metaphysical: Spiritual Enlightenment Spiral Essence Unicorn and Griffon with Celtic Knot: Magickal Unicorn Moon Series: Bestselling Piece, My icon image Unicorn and Dragon Lovers Eternal Embrace Binders, T-shirts, blankets and more For the Goths: Gothic Fantasy: clothes and home decor Wolves, Dogs and Canines: clothes, blankets and more Griffons: wearable art Cats, Kittens, Panthers, Lions, Tigers and felines: blankets, pillows, T-shirts, cards and more Gift Ideas for all ages: and greeting cards too! description: The Cheetah female called Suna (Acinonyx jubatus, Gepard tíhlý, Status: Vulnerable) from ZOO Ústí nad Labem, the Czech Republic. The International Cheetah Day Challenge (ICDC) is the day when you, supporters of saving the endangered cheetah, use art to raise awareness about this dying species and maybe even raise money for the cause! The idea behind the challenge is that deviantART's front page will be totally filled with cheetah-themed art for at least one day, and through this people will look into what's going on. Tadadada-daaa! More info here: Cheetah Conservation Fund, [link] You can purchase (Premium Content) full size of this photo without link for your personal use --> Petra Allerlei's Photos and Art

description: Edit: I had no idea I'd get his much faves for this Bless y'all for thinking the same way. I can't thank all of you (there's like... 54 of you and I dunno lol) individually because I'd be here all day, but thank you for your support Any, by the way, I encourage everyone to share this. Tumblr it, Facebook it, anything. No credit is neccessary, what's important it this gets out to as many people possible. Whipped this up for today's Spirit event <3 The quote at the front is from Dr. Seuss, and the ones in the background are ones I've stumbled upon today. It's rather outrageous how bigoted and idiotic people can be nowadays. Humans are humans, nothing will ever change that, whether they're gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgendered oozing bright pink light or throwing up rainbows. "It always seemed to me a bit pointless to disapprove of homosexuality. It's like disapproving of rain." Francis Maude

description: ... since there is always hope. This photograph is taking part in the "Hope" contest organised by the #inspirational-images group. ~~~ Happy Valentine's Day, everyone! ~~~ Inspired by this story: The Perfect Heart I'm quite sure many people have read this wonderful story ~~~ Last night, I looked at the wishes posted on FB for Valentine's Day and wondered what I could possibly make. While searching through the mess on my table (k i should clean this soon ), I suddenly noticed the red heart standing out on an ace of hearts. After thirty minutes I came up with this idea, so on the next day I went to a DIY shop to buy some aluminum wire and a pair of pliers (huh why didn't I have this ready at home ) For this picture I used a DIY softbox, a flashgun and a piece of pink acrylic sheet, which was placed on the top to create some pinkish glow. Here's my set-up for those who are curious Featured here by *stratopharius Click here to create a critique!

With Valentine's Day just around the corner, now's the time to create valentines for your fellow deviants to share with their special someones. Take part and help spread the love! description: 100% ballpoint pen (Biro)!!! This is for 's Contest 16 - The Artists The underlying idea of the contest is to draw the people behind Disney films who have most inspired you. Who are your chosen artists? I chose Ed Catmull, Steve Jobs, and John Lasseter When were they born? And when did they work for Disney? Ed was born on March 31, 1945 in Parkersburg, West Virginia. Steve was born on February 24, 1955 in San Francisco, California. John was born on January 12, 1957 in Hollywood, California. These men are remembered as the driving force behind Pixar Animation Studios. Pixar began in 1979 under Lucasfilm; it was bought by Steve Jobs in 1986; it has now been owned by The Walt Disney Company since 2006. What did they do? 1. Started Pixar. 2. Made my favorite movies. 3. Inspire people around the world. In 2007 Brad Bird said it best: "All three Pixar founders are smart people who understand the creative process better than anyone. To have one of those guys would be amazing; to have three of them in the same company is a freak of nature. It should be respected in the same way as the Grand Canyon: it happened, nobody knows how it happened, but you've got to be humbled by it." What do you find inspiring about these artists? Their drive to give the world the best they can give. What can every aspiring artist learn from these remarkable men? Perseverance. All of these men have gone through many difficult trials, but they did not give up. To see more entries, go here!: disney-club.deviantart.com/gal… I used this famous photo of them as a reference 2.bp.blogspot.com/-lru4_n3bv1Y… As well as the fantastic caricatures by Teddy Newton found in the wonderful book To Infinity and Beyond! Similar to these www.pixartalk.com/wp-content/u… I have been wanting to draw these guys for a while now and I finally did. :thumb253024851:

description: This is my entry for the Contest-Valentine's Day by Inspired by Silenziosamente by SilenziosamenteCi guardammo a lungo, quasi ad assaporare ogni singolo dettaglio l’uno dell’altra. I nostri occhi scrutavano famelici i tratti dei nostri visi, analizzavano attenti le curve del naso, delle orecchie, della bocca, la forma della fronte. Poi, un sorriso. Ecco cosa mi piaceva di lei. Era uno di quei sorrisi che ti fanno dimenticare dove ti trovi, che oscurano qualsiasi cosa ti circondi e diventano l’unica melodia in una stanza invasa dalla musica. Con lei non c’era bisogno di parlare. I suoi occhi color ambra esprimevano più di semplici parole. Ci venimmo in contro, come al rallentatore: al centro della piazza, fermi, immobili, continuammo a guardarci. Il battito regolare del mio cuore faceva da sottofondo ai nostri sguardi silenziosi e carichi di affetto. Le sfiorai una guancia e lei appoggiò la sua mano sulla mia. E mi sorrise. Di nuovo. Mi sporsi in avanti e le nostre labbra si trovarono subito, dolci, soffici, leggere come le ali di un angelo. Mai Thanks to: • Mirish for couple • ForestGirlStock for field 1 and 2 • CathleenTarawhiti for sky • wolverine041269 for butterfly • Eirian-stock for flowers • ibitiura for lights The rest is painted. Hope you like it! Update: [Mar 4 2015] The Best of the Best Feature by [Mar 5 2015] 10 Member Feature #9 by [Mar 8 2015] Monthly Feature III: March by [Aug 21 2015] 100 Favourites by My works are created by myself using my own imagination and creativity. Please do not use, copy, reproduce, redistribute or claim my artwork without written permission. By doing so you will be violating terms of my copyright.

description: If I have you my feelings explode and the whole universe echoes our love - Ode to our Soul - Every nice feeling deserves an ode, and "euphoria" is the most powerful ones. It is the summit of feelings once we achieve our dreams or big wishes, just like getting a gold medal in your sport (or a good position in a ranking that wasn't expected), but it can also happen when you love someone and you love him/her so much that you feel your heart will explode and all you feel will cross the seas and the whole universe as shock waves. is there anything better than this small moment of "glory"? Feel Euphoria

description: Happy early Valentines day everyone! I hope you all have an amazing day full of love, and beauty! This was me having some fun with a little bead, and a bulb! description: I will never......EVER....draw so much roses again... Those flowers took me 3-4 hours to outline ONLY, even when I haven't drawn them all by myself!!! *haah haah haah* So yea, this piece took me nearly forever and all of my nerves to finish...and I also tried a new way to add the shadding... And I have to add....that I'm pretty....damn....proud of myself! I worked so hard on this and now I'm satisfied with the result (what doesn't happen that often...) And all of it just for you guys! Just for you!!! Because today is Valentin's Day And I wanted to use this opportunity to say all of my besties how much they mean to me! If I have forgot anyone I'm sorry x'D I'm pretty tired at the moment. Thank you for anything I could think of now. For your support, your kind words, for any gifts and stuff, for your patience with me and your friendship! I may not be the best friend anyone could wish for but you should know that you all are dear to me! Hopefully you can endure me a little while longer~ Have a lovely day! And god blesses the person who invented those waistcoats Rose reference Waistcoat reference Drawing and Tyro (c) HinaTheBlue

description: This is for the DA special and I chose red because it's one of my favorite colors plus my persona has the same hair color. I have a reason to be genderfluid, unlike those 13-17 year olds. I thought I was a boy when I was I think 4 or 5. I felt I wasn't like the other girls and yet I had some things in my life such as both girl and boy toys. Going through high school I felt right with the guys in PE though I went to separate locker rooms like normal people do and I was the only girl in weight lifting side in which most of the guys were going for. Way after high school and going through as a 22 yo at the time, I found out that genderfluid is a thing even though it wasn't the right place (Tumblr) but yes I accepted and came out to my soon to be husband Larry about it, he felt weird at first but he accepted the feelings I had. I'm happy I have a woman's body but there are times I wonder what it's like being a guy having a penis for one day. There will be times I feel like a guy wearing men's clothes and there will be times I feel neutral and there's feminine times I feel while I rarely wear dresses. Guys thank you for reading my part of this and I wish you all a great pride month! NOTE: Anyone who tries to force me to believe in your theory really needs to back the fuck off, If you do keep on harping stupid shit opinions on me thinking you are god and try to force me to agree all the way you are AUTOMATICALLY BLOCKED I try to be nice to people even on here but if they don't respect my opinion by the words AGREE TO DISAGREE you're being abusive and never worth my time I don't give a fuck if you believe in two or +70 genders just don't force me to believe your shit all the way. I at least try to be respectful and talk bullshit while AGREE TO DISAGREE but that don't give anyone the right to be abusive towards one another for just a fucking opinion or whatever! FOR FUCKS SAKE YOU ALL NEED TO GROW UP OR GET OFF THE INTERNET FOR DAMN ONCE like a real adult who needs a job (or creating one) and also go fucking socialize outside the net like a real human being!!! If it says it's all a bullshit lie within +10 years I'm more likely to believe as a person/human not a sheep.

description: Every hug from you is a flower in the silence of my sleep - Ode to our Soul - Every nice feeling deserves an ode, and "serenity" is one of them. Our life is so exciting that we do not really enjoy our time, so those moments when everything is calmed and we are close to our people is when our soul enjoys life. An example is that for every hug we receive a flower blooms in that small but powerful silence, and more when we are resting after a tiring day. Small pieces of love will heal our injuries when we close our eyes. Feel serenity

description: plus a cat a chick and a semi terrible drawn angora rabbit. i made neils hair tint pink because i can and cause his picture always looked to me like it turned pink at the tips. i messed up on cliff and neil, their facing one way but i wanted their eyes looking the other way, but it doesnt quite look like it. No Cam and Nadi aren't blushing at each other, although now i cant unsee that ship Cam and Amir are supposed to be hitting on the viewer (or the game player) and Nadi was but he noticed cam has more flowers than him and now hes annoyed. Skye is probably flirting with the viewer in his own snobbish way. cliff is embarrassed to give the viewer chocolate. and Neil is all tsundere about giving chocolate to the viewer. a lined up version of this legendary444.deviantart.com/ar… i really wish they would give Skye a redesign like some of the others have he looks so plain here compared to the others with all their details. actually i would love for anyone (official or not) to redesign him a more detailed outfit as if he were in story of seasons or a new beginning. and the sprite would be sooo cute too! im gonna try and add cliff and Neil to this image before i color it. this is actually my favorite hm characters in order. Amir and Cam/Kamil practically tie, i ADORE them. I really like Nadi too and i loved Skyes face sprites, and i adored cliff on ds cute he reminded me of Ranma from Ranma 1/2 XD Neils pretty cute too although in this image i messed up on him abit.

description: Alternate Title: "I Still Need to Learn How to Use MS Paint." I'm not a real tech-head. I still draw with paper and pencil then scan it into my computer. MS Paint is just for rough touch-ups for me. So I had the brilliant idea of printing out the template, sketching in the preliminary stuff, and then scan it and do most of the work on the computer for practice. I have a stylus and tablet pad, that's almost list a pencil! Should be easy I said. It still feels like I was finger-painting. Oh well. Least I get a badge out of it. I've had outer space on my mind again, and what I'm trying to say with this piece is that the space economy of the future will depend on gigantic geometric shapes, and butterflies are still pretty to look at. What's it breathing? Maybe butterflies can just hold their breath for a reeeeeeeeaaaaaalllllllyyy long time. Ever think of that?

description: Hiii!! It's 15th of February, so... I'm kinda late ._. I wanted to submit this sooner, but I wasted 7 HOURS of my life drawing this. 7. F*CKING. HOURS. I used 10 layers just for hair (5 to Anna, 5 to Kristoff), other 10 to their blush and 4 for their eyes. Actually, I'm really proud of this. I mean, I never drew something THIS detailed (you won't see too much detail, 'cause I edited it after finish...) and it was a challenge. But I guess I had success I think... Hope you like it!! And don't be afraid of comment!! I can't improve without your opinion! Frozen (c) Disney Edited with BeFunky. Snowflakes Brush made by ASlovesLisa

description: Wallpaper Pack on this work DOWNLOAD Steve sowed a seed... He came to share his dream for something more, and now has left us with the tools we need to dream even bigger than ever before. May his essence live on forever. "To infinity and beyond!" - I followed my inner innovation with passion filled typography design work with a truly text that I came on, just like Steve liked and have learned us all Share and love - Become a fan! facebook.com/wellgraphic Website: wellgraphic.com Contact: pontus@wellgraphic.com

description: Did this for the community project here on DA, for the LGBQT+ month. Some of my old friends are lesbian or gay, and I just want to support all of them, because they deserve to be loved as well as any other human being. Plus, I don't believe that people can be 100% heterosexual, so in the end, we're all alike. This is for the categorie yellow, standing for engergy/sunshine. We all should be accepted as we are, but more importantly, we should accept ourselves as we are first, and that's what this stands for. Find the harmony in yourself, and you'll find it easier to find harmony with others as well.

description: My piece for "Enchanted Visions" month theme! Totally inspired from 22 April: Earth Day Our planet has enchanted lands and objects, and every day we artists can find our personal ispiration... From moon, night to hills and nature... But also modern still life and technology. But, for first, Earth is our home, and we must protect it from we-self. I'm not a perfect ecologist, bla bla bla... I simply dedicated this my piece, to my home: Earth. Hope you like it! This is tutorial based on this work: Tools: - Fabriano Watercolors Postcard Paper - HB-B-2B Graphite - Maimeri Watercolors - Caran d'Ache Watercolor Pencils - White Ecoline - Glitters No Digital Retouch! ...And Comments!! description: A resubmission of PP Part 13 for Pride Month, and I decided to go for the whole spectrum! (discluding purple) Red: The red Porsche resembles the freedom and liveliness to drive such an awesome car. Orange: The orange track resembles the memories of Hot Wheels tracks as a kid, and those good memories can heal new wounds. Yellow: The yellow sunlight resembles how the track ahead goes into the sunlight, which gives you energy for what's ahead. Green: The green trees and grass show the nature Part of the spectrum. Blue: The blue water has stillness, which resembles harmony and peace, while providing a nice backdrop.
